name: James Smith
description: is so good to love somebody then somebody loves u. I am a fun loving person. I am a very caring and sensitive person, I am a level headed, down to earth person who is totally devoted to the one I love. I tend to be shy at first, but I will open up quickly with the right person.I am confident, calm. i have a son Roy lovely son if u may ask and that is what i have now is a very kind and lovey son for me. am a fashion designer i love what i do i enjoy working with nice model and like to be with honest people i hate liars
